newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle sell $69, steady - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle sell $69, steady - USDA.

text.p: Trade was moderate in the Panhandle area Thursday, USDA said.

Slaughter steers and heifers steady. Feedlots reporting moderate inquiry from buyers. Sales reported on 5,700 slaughter steers and 800 heifers; 87,500 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 15,000 formulated cattle and 1,900 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1250 lbs 69.00. Pen Select, few Choice 2-3 1100 lbs 68.00. Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1000-1150 lbs 69.00.
Wk to Date - 87,500 Week Ago - 100,100 Year Ago - 82,000
